actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce certain functions of the Secretary of the Interior relating to encouraging, promoting, and developing travel within the United States.

summary.text: Transfers to the Secretary of Commerce those functions of the Secretary of the Interior relating to encouraging, promoting, and developing travel within the United States.

titles.title: A bill to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce certain functions of the Secretary of the Interior relating to encouraging, promoting, and developing travel within the United States.
